attributes.action: WE NEED ST HELENS  COUNCIL  TO AGREE TO   NEW PLANS  TO TURN THE RAMS HEAD HOTEL  INTO  A LUXURY HOTEL
attributes.additional_details: The Rams Head Hotel  Church Road Haydock is in a derelict state  it is an eyesore for all who live near it. We want the building saved  and refurbished , The present owner  wants to turn it into a luxury hotel  with 14 bedrooms and 14 ensuites there is sufficient parking already in place for this venture  , we need St Helens council who are in negotiations with the owner  to come to a agreement  quickly  about these plans , the Community are behind these plans , We need them to act fast  as the building is crumbling  more each day . We  need  the government  to step in and get this building work  to  commence immediately .
